-- Table: public.Enrollment

-- DROP TABLE IF EXISTS public."Enrollment";

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."Enrollment"
(
    "Id" integer NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    "ClassId" integer NOT NULL,
    "CreatedOn" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,
    "ModifiedOn" timestamp with time zone,
    "CreatedBy" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    "ModifiedBy" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "UserId" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    CONSTRAINT "PK_Enrollment" PRIMARY KEY ("Id")
)

TABLESPACE pg_default;

ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public."Enrollment"
    OWNER to postgres;





-- Table: public.Classes

-- DROP TABLE IF EXISTS public."Classes";

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."Classes"
(
    "Id" integer NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    "ClassName" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    "ClassDetails" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    "Grade" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    "Timing" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,
    "MaxSize" integer NOT NULL,
    "CreatedOn" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,
    "ModifiedOn" timestamp with time zone,
    "CreatedBy" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    "ModifiedBy" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    CONSTRAINT "PK_Classes" PRIMARY KEY ("Id")
)

TABLESPACE pg_default;

ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public."Classes"
    OWNER to postgres;
